summary: American Pepe! - Meet Pepe, the frog who’s traded in his swamp for the land of the free and the home of the brave! Decked out in red, white, and blue, our patriotic Pepe is here to make meme coins great again. With his trusty bald eagle sidekick and a star-spangled top hat, The American Pepe embodies the true spirit of liberty, justice, and humor for all.
